sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: These Terms and Conditions govern your use of the LLF Tech Solutions app and services. By using the app, you agree to these terms.

sections.title: Eligibility
sections.content: You must be authorized by your organization to access and use the app. Unauthorized access or use is strictly prohibited.

sections.title: User Responsibilities
sections.content: You agree to use the app in accordance with applicable laws and company policies. You are responsible for the accuracy of inspection data submitted.

sections.title: Inspection Data
sections.content: Inspection reports, including comments and media files, must be accurate and truthful. Submitting false information may lead to disciplinary action.

sections.title: Account Security
sections.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials and for all activities conducted under your account.

sections.title: Media Uploads
sections.content: Images and videos uploaded during inspections are stored securely and used solely for maintenance and review purposes by authorized personnel.

sections.title: Offline Usage
sections.content: The app supports offline inspection data collection. Offline data will be synced automatically when an internet connection is available.

sections.title: Service Availability
sections.content: We strive to ensure high availability of the service, but we do not guarantee uninterrupted access. Planned maintenance or unforeseen issues may cause downtime.

sections.title: Termination
sections.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the app at our discretion, especially in cases of misuse or policy violations.

sections.title: Changes to Terms
sections.content: We may update these Terms and Conditions from time to time. Continued use of the app after such updates constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at support@llftech.com.
